## hpr3165 :: Spanish Tools Continued

 I decided to use my time spent in relative isolation to do something productive and learn another language. I picked Spanish because I am hoping to visit Mexico and other Latin American countries whenever the plague lifts. I decided to document this for anyone who wants to know what options I found and how they have worked for me so far. This is the second part of my tools exploration.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3iaeeUxWOgUXFK6kfIp_Ig
https://www.alllanguageresources.com/spanish/
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hyLl_0d0EBw&list=PLTpetkN815Qyuc2RbC1kxxMQvxjQ3RnYG
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QWEXFfqwh7w&list=PL80Flen6gkH_9j4OxsDucs9mbKjl5ccvU
https://radiolingua.com/category/coffee-break-spanish/
https://www.fluentu.com/blog/spanish/coffee-break-spanish-review/
https://www.alllanguageresources.com/coffee-break-spanish/
https://spanishlandschool.com/best-spanish-podcasts/
https://podcast.duolingo.com/spanish
https://www.alllanguageresources.com/spanish-podcasts/
https://mashable.com/2017/12/07/duolingo-launches-spanish-podcast/
